Comments.Message:
I did some testing and found out that apparently nodes with numeric id attributes are not displayed correctly

   <rect
       x="1064"
       y="1900"
       width="8"
style="fill:#ece9d8"       
height="200"
        id="a" />

works but 

  <rect
       x="100"
       y="100"
       width="1800"
       height="1800"
    style="fill:#ece9d8"       
       id="10" />

does not
